title: Frame drops after windows 10 fall creators update
body:
so league was running fine on my comp until i did the windows 10 fall creator update the other day, now when i'm in game i get MASSIVE frame rate drops and freezes when i make any input in the game with my mouse, if i don't touch anything and just sit there the game runs like normal, but if i move my mouse i get frame drops, especially when moving the camera (i play unlocked cam) and (i did this just to test my input theory) if i spin my cursor in a circle real fast the frame rate goes from its usual 70-100 down to around 5. this has mad the game pretty much unplayable and i'm not sure how to fix it.

yes i've tried turning the power off and on lol.

computer specs: AMD FX-8350 CPU, MSI Gaming 970 MoBo, GTX 680 G Card

replies.body: Heya, make sure that the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) is disabled as it's been known to cause this and re-enable after updates.  let me know if that helps!
